Traits.Name: Skirmisher
Traits.Description: Can move diagonally and dash action is full speed.

Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to damage from successful saves, area effects, or missed attacks.

Traits.Name: Spectral Steed
Traits.Description: The Spectral Rider is mounted upon a gundead steed making them size 2 and gain phasing while moving. When bloodied, they lose this trait for the rest of combat.

Actions.Name: Mobile Shot
Actions.Effect: The Spectral Rider may dash 1 before and after the attack.

Actions.Name: Ethereal Charge
Actions.Description: Mark out a line area effect equal to your speed, then dash to the end, phasing through characters. Each foe it passes through takes [fray] damage and is frostbitten. Frostbitten characters instead take [D].

Actions.Name: Corrupted Lasso
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 must save or be shoved 3 spaces towards the spectral rider and inflicted with frostbite.

Actions.Name: Hail of Bullets
Actions.Description: Target a close blast 2 area. Shoot 5 bullets at foes in the area. Each bullet deals [fray] damage and ignores cover. Each foe must be hit at least once before being hit by another bullet.
